name: Gettin' Dicey (mgmgmg, Audrey)
description:
This game was submitted to the 2022 GMTK Game Jam


Brief explanation

In this challenging platformer your goal is to reach the end of each level by using your movement abilities, but there's a twist: you don't get to choose which one to use!

A dice will be constantly changing around how you are meant to move, which you'll notice is both a blessing and a curse.


Controls Action Computer Xbox controller Playstation controller Run A / D Left analogue stick Left analogue stick Jump Spacebar B X Pause Escape X O

Developed by BeemoNeemo and mgmgmg.
